https://youtu.be/X0t_G9lc96A

每次一開始，聽到鋼琴bass個note出唔到（比管弦樂遮住左）就唔想聽落去，入唔到心

我都有少少理解既 但係個粒音本身係好難聽唔到
因為佢係應該同double bass一齊出 除非話係分唔到黎自鋼琴定double bass

亂入

https://youtu.be/X0t_G9lc96A

每次一開始，聽到鋼琴bass個note出唔到（比管弦樂遮住左）就唔想聽落去，入唔到心

我都有少少理解既 但係個粒音本身係好難話聽唔到
因為佢係應該同double bass一齊出 除非話係分唔到黎自鋼琴定double bass

巴打，Chopin ballade入面我最鍾意no.1,雖然旋律簡約（比no.4,no.3)，但好有力咁讓我感受到當中嘅淒美（個人主觀感受），由開始沉重，到憂愁，到解放，生動活潑，帶點輕狂，再回到憂傷，繼而落去怨憤，吶喊。對我黎講，真係講緊故事咁，係真正嘅敍事曲。Simple but powerful!! （純分享），每次彈no.1都真係感受好深刻，雖然no.4個種感覺都係舒服，不過過於炫技（感覺）

我又亂入下 勁得意
https://youtu.be/RFMNhx2-VDE

me都ok 係純粹諗住夜晚咁悲壯唔係好match姐

rachmaninoff Etude-Tableaux op.39 no.5
rach既呢首就相信未必有咁多人接受到
係引入到尾段 左手要敲打厚重既和弦 令人聽覺上有d難受
但係呢種低音既運用 為鋼琴本身所產生既交響同色彩效果
一直都係rach既特色

我試下加番歌詞 (右邊係羅馬拼音黎
In the morning, at daybreak,Po utru, na zare,
over the dewy grass,Po rosistoj trave,
I will go to breathe the crisp dawn;Ja pojdu svežim utrom dyšat’;
and in the fragrant shade,I v dušistuju ten’,
where the lilac crowds,Gde tesnitsja siren’,
I will go to seek my happiness...Ja pojdu svoe sčast’e iskat’...

In life, only one happinessV žizni sčast’e odno
it was fated for me to discover,Mne najti suždeno,
and that happiness lives in the lilacs;I to sčast’e v sireni živët;
in the green boughs,Na zelënyh vetvjah,
in the fragrant bunches,Na dušistyh kistjah
my poor happiness blossoms...Moë bednoe sčast’e cvetët...

There is nothing V mire net ničego
more desirableDoždelennee sna,
In the world than the dream.Čary est’ u nego,
It has magic stillness.U nego tišina,
It has on its lipsU nego na ustah
No sadness, no laughterNi pečal’ i ni smeh,
And bottomless eyes,I v bezdonnyh očah
and many hidden pleasures.Mnogo tajnyh uteh.

It has two immense wings,U nego široki,
as light as Široki dva kryla,
the shadow of midnight.I legki, tak lëgki,
It's unfathomable Kak polnočnaja mgla.
how it carries them, Ne ponjat’, kak nesët,
and where and on what;I kuda i na čem
It will not beat its wings,On krylom ne vzmahnet
And it will not move its shoulder.I ne dvinet plečom.
